page.title: 20CHILDRENS' INTERESTS HONING
page.content: A survey of the hobbies, pastimes and interests of 21 8+ pupils of Honing and E.Ruston schools revealed the following:- 7 coarse fishing,computers 5 reading,swimming,music making, 4 stamp and postcard collecting,judo, 3 cubs,collecting rubbers,horse riding, ballet, 2 collecting key rings, chess, star wars models,toy tractors,tennis, football,wild flowers,gardening, athletics, 1 collecting eggs,tea bag cards,matchboxes, shooting,cricket, bird watching,boating,dancing, skate boarding,model making,model robots, dinosaurs,lego,ghost buster and 'He- man models, toy guns,football stickers model cars,model animals,model aircraft, model steam engines. The information for the Honing E. Ruston sector has been compiled by the friends and last pupils of Honing Voluntary Controlled Primary School.
